About the Company: Competent Automobiles Company Ltd is engaged in the automobile business.The company operates in two business segments -- Automobile showrooms and Automobile workshops.In the showrooms helpful executives, working under the over all guidance of Branch Manager, provides answers to customer queries, explain the features of various models and provide advice and assistance. They even accompany customers on test drive of new cars.The workshops are equipped with the latest high end technology tools and equipment, managed and manned by highly qualified, experienced and motivated managers and workers..The company also in the business segment of Showroom, Service and Spares.
